title: Three Cheese and Potato Soup
ingredients: ['950ml water', '600ml chicken stock', '4 tablespoons chicken stock granules', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 large carrots, finely chopped', '4 potatoes, peeled and diced', '1 large onion, diced', '2 sticks celery, finely chopped', '1 red pepper, diced', '250ml mayonnaise', '250g processed cheese, such as Kraft singles, unwrapped and chopped', '125g grated mature Cheddar cheese', '65g grated Gruyere cheese', '4 tablespoons instant mash flakes or granules']
